document_data.caption: Lord Orgauth
document_data.name: Orgauth
document_data.mainbody: '''Orgauth''' ({{Pronounce|ORE|goth|refs=}}) was a veteran of fifteen years of service to the [[Zhentilar]] and later became a Lord of [[Zhentil Keep]].
document_data.Description: Dark-haired and generously moustached with hints of grey revealing his age, Orgauth kept his hair tightly pulled back in a ponytail. Weathered skin and a prominent scar on his chin were reminders to all who met him of his military past, along with the cold, grey eyes. Despite this, Orgauth pulled off a lordly look with his expensive black silk clothing and a striking silver chain clasp that displayed his personal crest—a tower upon a scarlet field with the rising sun behind it.
document_data.Personality: On the surface he was a disarmingly blunt merchant and warrior, but beneath it all Orgauth was a subtle and merciless plotter.
document_data.Abilities: A well-versed veteran of the Zhentilar forces with fifteen years experience, Orgauth was tough and trained in the skills of both warfare and survival. In combat he utilized his [[bastard sword]] in the two-handed style and had capitalized on the properties of his [[light crossbow]] with his ''eyes of the eagle'' to take down distant targets.
document_data.Possessions: Being both a lord and a wealthy merchant Orgauth had access to a great variety of items but tended to keep a few personal effects upon him most of the time. Orgauth armed himself with his [[magical]] [[plate mail]], [[bastard sword]], and [[light crossbow]] of [[distance (weapon property)|distance]].
document_data.Relationships: Circa [[1357 DR]], thanks to their shared interest in slaving, Orgauth had a business relationship with fellow council lord, [[Marsh Belwintle]].

History.Early life: Hailing from a wealthy noble house and the son of the noble [[Denuth]], Orgauth made a name for himself as a member of the Zhentilar over the course of fifteen years service.
